name: TokenMod
description: TokenMod provides an interface to setting almost all settable properties of a token.For instructions see the *Help: TokenMod* Handout in game, or run `!token-mod --help` in game, or visit [TokenMod Forum Thread](https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/4225825/script-update-tokenmod-an-interface-to-adjusting-properties-of-a-token-from-a-macro-or-the-chat-area).

useroptions.name: Players can use --ids
useroptions.description: Select this option to allow players to use the `--ids` parameter to specify tokens they don't control to be modified.
